DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate level repeat dose CTAP101 change body time ( pharmacokinetics , PK ) CTAP101 affect mineral hormonal balance ( pharmacodynamics , PD ) patient chronic kidney disease ( CKD , vitamin D insufficiency secondary hyperparathyroidism ( SHPT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Safety/Efficacy Study CTAP101 Chronic Kidney Disease Subjects With Secondary Hyperparathyroidism ( SHPT )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Urinary albumin excretion ≤3000 μg creatinine 2 . Stage 3 CKD 3 . Plasma iPTH : > 70 pg/mL < 500 pg/mL 4 . Serum Ca : ≥ 8.4 mg/dL < 10.0 mg/dL 5 . Serum P : ≥ 2.0 mg/dL < 5.0 mg/dL 6 . Serum 25hydroxyvitamin D : > 10 ng/mL < 29 ng/mL . 7 . Discontinue vitamin D use duration study 1 . History kidney transplant parathyroidectomy 2 . Spot urine calcium : creatinine ratio > 0.2 3 . Current serious illness , malignancy , HIV , liver disease , cardiovascular event hepatitis 4 . Currently dialysis
